Key Match Events: Harden added 14 points in the third quarter after trailing 47-39 at halftime, giving the Clippers a 74-72 lead before the fourth quarter.
Post-Match Reflections: Harden had a chance to win the game for the Clippers but missed a potential game-winning layup as time expired.
Harden looked tired in the extra period but continued to run the offense.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at the newly-opened Intuit Dome.
